LanguageData.FGL_EarlyContentLoading_Label: Preload mod assets during idle periods. May briefly freeze while loading; disable if this causes issues.
LanguageData.FGL_DelayGraphicLoading_Label: Defer startup loading of graphics/icons and stream them in during play. May be unstable; disable if problems occur.
LanguageData.FGL_DisableStaticAtlasesBaking_Label: Disable static atlas baking. May make map rendering slightly slower.
LanguageData.FGL_TextureDownscale_Description: Some mods ship many high-res textures that load slowly; use this to downscale them. This also deletes RimPy-generated DDS files so you can recompress again. The following textures will be reduced to target sizes: Building - 256px Units/Creatures - 256px Apparel - 128px Weapons - 128px Items - 128px Plants - 128px Trees - 256px Terrain - 1024px
LanguageData.FGL_TextureDownscale_Confirm: Run texture downscaling? Re-download the affected mods to revert.
